metadata.title: CVE-2023-6932 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's ipv4: igmp componentcan be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. A race conditioncan be exploited to cause a timer be mistakenly registered on a RCU readlocked object which is freed by another thread. We recommend upgrading pastcommit e2b706c691905fe78468c361aaabc719d0a496f1.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
